amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit the ability to file disclaimers that are within a designated National Mounment, Wilderness Study Area, National Park System unit, National Wildlife Refuge System unit or lands within the National Wilderness Preservation System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Taylor (NC) amendment (A024) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 194 (Roll no. 388).

action.text: Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Taylor (NC) to the Udall (CO) amendment (A020).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Taylor (NC) to the Udall (CO) amendment (A020).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
